name: Play Smart Hangman
description:
This Android game is the well-known game Hangman.
The categories that includes are: "Attractions from all the world", "Books", "Box Office stars", "Capital of country",  "Constellations", "Country from flag", "Country from capital", "English football", "Famous people","Movies", "Olympic sports", "Proverbs", "Riddles" and "Walt Disney movies".
You can share a screenshot of the game via Twitter, Facebook, E-mail.
Supported languages: Bulgarian, Dutch, English, French, Greek, Italianο, Portuguese, Rusian, Spanish.
